text: Oscar N. Harris (November 6, 1939 â€“ January 28, 2020) was an American accountant and politician. He was born in Newton Grove, North Carolina. He was a Democrat. He was a state senator from 1998 to 2002. He served as mayor of Dunn, North Carolina from 1987 to 1995 and again from 2003 to 2019. Harris died on January 28, 2020, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Accountants Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:United States Marine Corps personnel Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Oscar N. Harris
